body: You can insert a saw between a door and its frame to cut through wooden bolts or bars, dealing 5 hit points per round plus your Strength modifier to the sawed object as a full-round action. Hearing the sawing requires a DC 10 Perception check. Saws used to cut ice on rivers have a point on the end to break through the ice before cutting.
name: Saw
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Tools and Skill Kits/Saw
